game_description: Blockies VR is a single player action-puzzle game where you knock down block buildings and protect friendly Blockies against the forces of evil. Launch a wide range of objects at enemies in this low-poly physics world. Travel to the Kingdomâ€™s shop to expand your weapon arsenal to take on the most difficult puzzles in all the land. Features -A dozen types of blocks that interact uniquely with the world -A dozen AI enemy types each with their own abilities -Levels where you must defend the Blockies from monster attacks -Levels with intricate block puzzles to solve -The Kingdom where cool new projectiles can be purchased -Beautifully designed low poly environments -At least 50 levels by full release (Currently 16) -With enough support: Level Editor to create and share new levels -With enough support: Co-op and Multiplayer Functionality Join the Discord to learn more about future updates, and provide your own feedback of what you want in the game!
review_1: Throwing the ball is difficult at first but then you quickly get better at it. Lots of different types of levels like ones with blocks and ones with enemies. Each ball has a different use so try each ball.
